column2: "Information for when you're in a pinch! Want some fresh info?"
"Actually, <%me> looks more annoyed by you than anything."
"Good luck! There's no known way of getting me to shut up!"
"Anyway, as far as the information goes, the place is right here! Amoo-...Amumumu-..."
"That's right! Amduscia! This planet apparently got struck by a meteorite and now has this weird shape."
"As such, the native creatures living here are really tough! You know the ones I mean, the Dragonkin."
"The Dragonkin are really intelligent, and even used to communicate with the ARKS."
"But recently, violent Dragonkin have been appearing. They attack ARKS members on sight, and for no reason."
"It's what you call kill or be killed."
"I'm being serious! If you don't defend yourself, you could get hurt!"
"If you're not around, then there will be no one to listen to my endless chatter!"
"What my sister is trying to say is that it's dangerous around here."
"Regardless of Patty's useless meddling, please take care."
